page.title: 19SHOPPING IN THE D-BLOCK
page.content: In the whole of our D-Block only two individual squares have shopping facilities and these are centred on Purston Jaglin. Purston has a large range of shops and services. As well as the usual smaller shops it also has estate agents, banks, furniture shops, a chemists and, as befits its location, a betting shop. Every house in Purston is within easy walking distance of a Post Office and Newsagents. In the outlying villages of Hessle and West Hardwick the inhabitants have to travel by car to do their shopping, as their community has no shopping facilities of any kind There is a wider variety and number of shops in the neighbouring community of Featherstone. Most locals however do their major shopping in the nearby larger town of Pontefract.
